content:
Enable Einstein Service Replies

To get started with Einstein generative AI, turn on Service Replies.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
Customize Application

Einstein Service Replies follows a chat conversation as it unfolds and then drafts and recommends fluent, courteous, and relevant replies for your agents to review, edit, and post. To get replies based on your Knowledge content, set up grounding.

From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Reply Recommendations, and then select Einstein Reply Recommendations.
Turn on Einstein for Service: Service Replies. 
Click Set Up Grounding.
TIP Enable Reply Recommendations before setting up Knowledge grounding.

Give Agents Access

Set Up and Configure Lightning Knowledge
Ground Einstein Responses with Your Service Data
title: Enabling Einstein Service Replies in Salesforce
